mapper.update:
update tax_rate
event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
